messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Whispering Woods Whodunit DATE: 09/09/89 The courtroom resonated with tension as the trial progressed. The defense called upon the officers pivotal to the investigation to clarify their actions. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Deputy V. W. Vaughn, the coordinator of the investigative team in this case. DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Thank you, Deputy Vaughn. Can you elaborate on the situation on the day the mystery emerged? WITNESS: Certainly. On the morning of May 5th, Officer X. Y. York came across a perplexing scenario in the Whispering Woods and notified the team. The investigation was initiated immediately. DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Who was responsible for the evidence analysis? WITNESS: Criminalist Z. A. Anderson and Technician B. C. Baker carried out the analysis of the collected evidence. DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Who led the questioning of suspects? WITNESS: Detective D. E. Edwards and Detective F. G. Grant took the lead in questioning the suspects and potential witnesses. DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Thank you. No further inquiries. The Prosecution subjected Deputy Vaughn to a rigorous cross-examination regarding the investigative methods. During the trial, Patrol Officer H. I. Ivy, Patrol Officer J. K. Kent, and Patrol Officer L. M. Morris were also summoned to testify.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Deputy V. W. Vaughn 
Officer Context: Deputy Vaughn is the coordinator of the investigative team in the Whispering Woods Whodunit case, elaborating on the situation on the day the mystery emerged during the trial. 
Officer Role: Deputy 

Officer Name: Officer X. Y. York 
Officer Context: Officer York discovered a perplexing scenario in the Whispering Woods on the morning of May 5th, which initiated the investigation. 
Officer Role: Officer 

Officer Name: Criminalist Z. A. Anderson 
Officer Context: Criminalist Anderson, alongside Technician B. C. Baker, carried out the analysis of the collected evidence related to the case. 
Officer Role: Criminalist 

Officer Name: Technician B. C. Baker 
Officer Context: Technician Baker worked with Criminalist Z. A. Anderson on analyzing the evidence concerning the perplexing scenario in the Whispering Woods. 
Officer Role: Technician 

Officer Name: Detective D. E. Edwards 
Officer Context: Detective Edwards, alongside Detective F. G. Grant, led the questioning of suspects and potential witnesses to gather more information regarding the mystery. 
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective F. G. Grant 
Officer Context: Detective Grant, along with Detective D. E. Edwards, took the lead in questioning the suspects and potential witnesses to gather more insight about the incident. 
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer H. I. Ivy 
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Ivy was summoned to testify during the trial, although their specific role in the investigation was not detailed in the transcript. 
Officer Role: Patrol Officer 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer J. K. Kent 
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Kent was also called to testify during the trial, although their specific role in the investigation was not detailed in the transcript. 
Officer Role: Patrol Officer 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer L. M. Morris 
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Morris was brought to testify during the trial, although their specific role in the investigation was not detailed in the transcript. 
Officer Role: Patrol Officer
